text: Bradley International Airport is an airport in Windsor Locks, Connecticut serving Hartford, Connecticut and Springfield, Massachusetts. It serves as a hub for UPS Airlines. Bradley International Airport hosts the following airlines: * Aer Lingus * Air Canada * American Airlines * Delta Airlines * JetBlue Airways * OneJet * Southwest Airlines * United Airlines It hosts an Admirals Club in Terminal A (West Concourse) and an Escape Lounge in the East Concourse. ==References== Category:Transport in Connecticut Category:Hartford, Connecticut Category:Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Airports in the United States
title: Bradley International Airport
